
\documentclass[border=2px]{standalone}

\usepackage[braket, qm]{qcircuit}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\begin{document}
\scalebox{1.0}{
\Qcircuit @C=1.0em @R=0.2em @!R { \\
\nghost{q_0} & \lstick{q_0} & \qw & \qw \\
\nghost{q_1} & \lstick{q_1} & \qw & \qw \\
\nghost{q_2} & \lstick{q_2} & \qw & \qw
\\ }}
\end{document}
